snippet.title: NITRO GEN OMEGA Announcement Trailer | Anime Sandbox Tactical RPG
snippet.description:
➤ WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2525510/NITRO_GEN_OMEGA/

NITRO GEN OMEGA is a Spaghetti Anime turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a crew of mercenaries through wastelands overrun by ruthless machines. Engage in high-octane cinematic Mech battles, recruit pilots and grow relationships. Play solo or join an online world where every character is procedurally generated.

➤ Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/QppkZ6nNeX
➤ Follow NITRO GEN OMEGA on X: https://x.com/nitrogenomega

Music composed by Alex Moukala
Vocals by Studio Nicktendo
Lead Guitars by Ro Panuganti
